alerts.description: Port scan detected from 192.168.1.1 to 192.168.1.2 on port 80.
alerts.action: Block traffic from 192.168.1.1 to 192.168.1.2 on port 80.
comments: Update the firewall rules to block traffic from the source IP address.

alerts.description: SYN flood attack detected from 10.0.0.1 to 10.0.0.2.
alerts.action: Enable SYN cookies on the firewall.
comments: Contact the network administrator of the source IP address.
Monitor the traffic to ensure that the attack has stopped.
